response: it is essential to protect personal information, especially in today's digital age where companies can access and collect our data without our knowledge or consent. the gdpr (general data protection regulation) ensures the protection of individuals from misuse of their private data by businesses. it sets out strict guidelines on how companies can use, store, and share your data. social media platforms should prioritize the privacy of their users and ensure that they have control over who has access to their personal information.
